network_io

Class IoStreamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • network_io.IoStreamHandler

  • public class IoStreamHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A network controller used to get and update comment from/to the server. Adapted From https://github.com/zjullion/PicPosterComplete/blob/master/src/ca/ualberta/cs/picposter/network/ElasticSearchOperations.java
    Author:
    xuping

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Thread addCache(java.lang.String commentID, java.lang.String parentID, CacheController cc, java.lang.String tag, Activity activity)
      Load a Comment and all it's replies for cache ,store it in the shared preferences depends on tag.
      java.lang.Thread addOrUpdateComment(Comment comment)
      Update a Comment with its own id to the web server, if the Comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this Comment will be added to the server.
      void clean()
      Trash all stuff on the server.

      Load and display a specific Comment's major content in EditCommentPageActivity (an Activity displays a specific Comment's content and allows user to edit).
      java.lang.Thread updateTopLevelIdSet(IdSet idSet)
      Update the top level comment's IdSet which stored in the server, if there's nothing in the server, then add it to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdateComment

        public java.lang.Thread addOrUpdateComment(Comment comment)
        Update a Comment with its own id to the web server, if the Comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this Comment will be added to the server.
        Parameters:
        comment - : a single comment object.
        Returns:
        the thread which perform the upload operation.

      • loadSpecificComment

        public java.lang.Thread loadSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentID,
                                   CommentMap commentMap,
                                   Activity activity)
        Put a Comment with the specific id into the CommentMap from the web server.
        Parameters:
        commentID - : a String which is the comment id.
        commentMap - : a CommentMap to be update.
        activity - : an Activity where the function will be called.
        Returns:
        the thread which perform the download operation.

      • updateTopLevelIdSet

        public java.lang.Thread updateTopLevelIdSet(IdSet idSet)
        Update the top level comment's IdSet which stored in the server, if there's nothing in the server, then add it to the server.
        Parameters:
        idSet - : top level comment's IdSet.
        Returns:
        the thread which perform the upload operation.

      • loadTopLevelComments

        public java.lang.Thread loadTopLevelComments(CommentMap commentMap,
                                    Activity activity)
        Load all of the top level comments in to a CommentMap.
        Parameters:
        commentMap - : a CommentMap.
        activity - : an Activity (AllTopicPageActivity) where the function will be called.
        Returns:
        the Thread which perform the download operation.

      • loadAndUpdateTopLevelIdSet

        public java.lang.Thread loadAndUpdateTopLevelIdSet(java.lang.String commentID,
                                          Activity activity)
        Add a comment id to the top level IdSet and update the IdSet in the server while publish a new top level comment.
        Parameters:
        commentID - : a String which is the comment id to be add to the IdSet.
        activity - : an Activity where the function will be called.
        Returns:
        the Thread which perform the update operation.

      • loadAndSetSpecificComment

        public java.lang.Thread loadAndSetSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentID,
                                         TextView title,
                                         TextView content,
                                         TextView commentInfo,
                                         ImageView picture,
                                         CommentMap commentMap,
                                         Activity activity)
        Load and display a specific Comment's major content in CommentPageActivity (an Activity displays a specific Comment's content).
        Parameters:
        commentID - : a String which is the comment id of the Comment.
        title - : a TextView which suppose display the title of the Comment after calling this function.
        content - : a TextView which suppose display the content of the Comment after calling this function.
        commentInfo - : a TextView which suppose display the posted time and location (if location is not null) of the Comment after calling this function.
        picture - : an ImageView which suppose display the picture of the Comment (if not null) after calling this function.
        commentMap - : a CommentMap which will contain all of the replies of this Comment after calling this function.
        activity - : an Activity (CommentPageActivity) where the function will be called.
        Returns:
        a Thread which will perform the loading operation.

      • replySpecificComment

        public java.lang.Thread replySpecificComment(java.lang.String parentID,
                                    java.lang.String replyID)
        Load a specific Comment by it's id and add an reply comment's id to this comment's reply IdSet, then update the Comment to the server.
        Parameters:
        parentID - : a String which is the comment id of the comment has been replied.
        replyID - : a String which is the comment id of the reply comment.
        Returns:
        a Thread which will perform the update operation.

      • setupEditPage

        public java.lang.Thread setupEditPage(java.lang.String commentID,
                             EditText title,
                             EditText content,
                             EditText latitude,
                             EditText longitude,
                             ImageView picture,
                             Activity activity)
        Load and display a specific Comment's major content in EditCommentPageActivity (an Activity displays a specific Comment's content and allows user to edit).
        Parameters:
        commentID - : a String which is the Comment's id.
        title - : an EditText which will contain the Comment's title after calling this function.
        content - : an EditText which will contain the Comment's content after calling this function.
        latitude - : an EditText which will contain the Comment's location's latitude after calling this function if the location is not null, otherwise it contains nothing after calling this function.
        longitude - : an EditText which will contain the Comment's location's longitude after calling this function if the location is not null, otherwise it contains nothing after calling this function.
        picture - : an ImageView which will contain the image of the Comment(if not null).
        activity - : an Activity where the function will be called.
        Returns:
        the thread which perform the loading operation.

      • commitEdit

        public java.lang.Thread commitEdit(java.lang.String commentID,
                          java.lang.String editedTitle,
                          java.lang.String editedText,
                          Location editedLocation)
        Update a edited Comment in to the server.
        Parameters:
        commentID - : a String which is comment id.
        editedTitle - : a String which is the title of the Comment after edit.
        editedText - : a String which is the content of the Comment after edit.
        Returns:
        a thread which perform the uploading operation.

      • addCache

        public java.lang.Thread addCache(java.lang.String commentID,
                        java.lang.String parentID,
                        CacheController cc,
                        java.lang.String tag,
                        Activity activity)
        Load a Comment and all it's replies for cache ,store it in the shared preferences depends on tag.
        Parameters:
        commentID - : a String which is the comment id.
        parentID - : a String which is the parent Comment's id.
        cc - : a CacheController object.
        tag - : a String which indicates how the comment will be stored
        activity - : an Activity where the function will be called.
        Returns:
        a Thread which perform the loading operation.

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Trash all stuff on the server.
